attributes.action: respect the interests of transparent government, and to publish a list of all MPs showing the amount they are asked to repay as an outcome of the Legg inquiry.  And a year later, to publish what they actually repaid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: MP's expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
